edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_final

Class GameBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cpp.cs.cs141.prog_final.GameBoard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GameBoard
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The Game Board object, which includes all of the agents including PowerUps(), Ninja()s, the Player(), Rooms() and the Briefcase()
    Author:
    Corey Perez, Eduardo Saenz, Lance Dall, Grant Posner, Bumjoong Kim, Jacob Chong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameBoard(GameEngine engine)
      Constructor for the GameBoard(GameEngine) Initializes GRID_SIZE, NUM_NINJAS and NUM_ROOMS as per the ge.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void printDebugGrid()
      Prints out the Grid in Debug mode, with everything being visible to the player.
      void printGrid()
      Prints out the grid with limited view.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GameBoard

        public GameBoard(GameEngine engine)
        Constructor for the GameBoard(GameEngine) Initializes GRID_SIZE, NUM_NINJAS and NUM_ROOMS as per the ge. The grid is created using GRID_SIZE
        Parameters:
        engine -

    • Method Detail

      • printDebugGrid

        public void printDebugGrid()
        Prints out the Grid in Debug mode, with everything being visible to the player. Initially sets all cells to be empty, then sets the Player(), then the Ninja()s, then the Rooms(), then randomly sets a Briefcase() in one of those rooms, then all the PowerUps

      • printGrid

        public void printGrid()
        Prints out the grid with limited view. For regular playing Initially sets all cells to be '*', then sets all spaces #GameEngine.VIEW_DIST amount away from (@link Player()}'s position, then sets the Player(), then the Ninja()s, then the Rooms(), then randomly sets a Briefcase() in one of those rooms, then all the PowerUps
